actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 703 and section 704 of the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 with respect to the completion of fencing, station parking, and station access as part of the Northeast Corridor railroad improvement program.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 to eliminate the requirement that Federal contributions to improve the nonoperational portions of stations used in intercity rail passenger service and of related facilities and fencing within the Northeast Corridor improvement project be limited to 50 percent of the cost of such improvements. Increases the amount authorized to be appropriated to effectuate such improvements.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 703 and section 704 of the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 with respect to the completion of fencing, station parking, and station access as part of the Northeast Corridor railroad improvement program.
